div.pre: 361 Kaliandra (anc. Mende), Macedonia, (521) 1892 Burial: c. 400 B.C. or later (T) Contents: AR Mende: tetrob. and smaller fr. Disposition: London, Berlin, LÃ¶becke and Philipsen acq. parts. Cf. J. Hirsch May 15 ff., 1905, 888-914 (possibly from this find)
